param.name: input_file
param.help: If empty, upload or import a SAM/BAM dataset.
param.label: SAM/BAM dataset

param.name: out_prefix
param.help: Use this remind you what the job was for.
param.label: Title for the output file

param.name: minIDbases
param.help: Total_reads / 4^max_id_bases reads will be compared at a time. Lower numbers = more accurate results and exponentially more time/memory.
param.label: Minimum identical bases at starts of reads for grouping

param.name: maxDiff
param.help: The maximum rate of differences between two reads to call them identical
param.label: Maximum difference rate for identical reads

param.name: minMeanQ
param.help: The minimum mean quality of bases in a read pair. Lower average quality reads filtered out from all calculations
param.label: Minimum percentage

param.name: readRegex
param.help: Names are parsed to extract: tile/region, x coordinate and y coordinate, to estimate optical duplication rate
param.label: Regular expression that can be used to parse read names in the incoming SAM file

param.name: optDupeDist
param.help: e.g. 5-10 pixels. Later Illumina software versions multiply pixel values by 10, in which case 50-100
param.label: The maximum offset between two duplicte clusters in order to consider them optical duplicates.
